title: Stepfamily Dynamics
creator_credit: Robert Ketton, Jane Keehn, Justine Anderson, Paul Van Dacon, Velissa Cheers and Shaun Gibbons
brief_description: Five vignettes are shown and each one illustrates a different situation in stepfamily life. The purpose of the vignettes is to increase the awareness of the complex interactions in the contemporary stepfamily and this video is a useful educational or counselling aid for stepfamily couples
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Ketton, Jane Keehn, Justine Anderson, Paul Van Dacon, Velissa Cheers and Shaun Gibbons
